question: Which have these scientific feats have been accomplished?

choices.explain: No... but we do have encrypted messages. HTTPS is close enough...
There are many people protesting experiments on this subject because of ethical issues. Geneticists in China are trying to make this happen, however.
Quantum computing is unreliable today, but as technology advances, the power of quantum computing may render all of RSA encryption obsolete. (that's a pretty bad thing)
